member.summary: Berlageの式
member.remarks: Berlage,Von H.P.:Zur Theorie der Beleuchtung einer horizontalen Flache durch Tageslicht,Meteorologische Zeitschrift, May 1928,pp.174-180

member.name: F:Popolo.Weather.Sun.DiffuseAndDirectNormalRadiationEstimatingMethod.Matsuo
member.summary: 松尾の式
member.remarks: 松尾陽:日本建築学会論文報告集,快晴時の日射について 日射量に関する研究2,pp.21-24,1960

member.name: F:Popolo.Weather.Sun.DiffuseAndDirectNormalRadiationEstimatingMethod.Nagata
member.summary: 永田の式
member.remarks: 永田忠彦:晴天空による水平面散乱の日射の式の試案,日本建築学会学術講演梗概集,1978

member.name: F:Popolo.Weather.Sun.DiffuseAndDirectNormalRadiationEstimatingMethod.LiuAndJordan
member.summary: Liu-Jordanの式
member.remarks: Liu,B.Y.H-Jordan,R.C:The interrelationship and characteristic distribution of direct, diffuse and total solar radiation, solar energy, Vol.4, No.3, 1960

member.name: F:Popolo.Weather.Sun.DiffuseAndDirectNormalRadiationEstimatingMethod.Udatgawa
member.summary: 宇田川の式
member.remarks: 宇田川光弘,木村建一:水平面全天日射量観測値よりの直達日射量の推定,日本建築学会論文報告集,No.267,pp.83-90,19780530

member.name: F:Popolo.Weather.Sun.DiffuseAndDirectNormalRadiationEstimatingMethod.Watanabe
member.summary: 渡辺の式

member.name: F:Popolo.Weather.Sun.DiffuseAndDirectNormalRadiationEstimatingMethod.Akasaka
member.summary: 赤坂の式
member.remarks: H.Akasaka:Model of circumsolar radiation and diffuse sky radiation including cloudy sky, ISES, Solar World Congress, 1991

member.name: F:Popolo.Weather.Sun.DiffuseAndDirectNormalRadiationEstimatingMethod.Miki

member.summary: 蒸気の比熱[kJ/kg/K]を温度[C]から求める
member.remarks: Specific heat equation from "Fundamentals of Classical Thermodynamics-SI Version" by Van Wylen and Sonntag Table A.9, pg. 683. Valid for T between 300-3500 K max error = .43%

member.name: M:Popolo.ThermophysicalProperty.Water.Cvs(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: 比熱[kJ/kg/K]を比体積[m3/kg]と温度[C]から求める

member.name: M:Popolo.ThermophysicalProperty.Water.Vissv(System.Double)
member.summary: 飽和水蒸気の動粘性係数[kg/m-s]を圧力[kPa]から求める
member.returns: 飽和水蒸気の動粘性係数[kg/m-s]
member.remarks: 'Heat Transfer' by Alan J. Chapman, 1974.

member.name: M:Popolo.ThermophysicalProperty.Water.Vissph(System.Double)
member.summary: 加熱蒸気の動粘性係数[kg/m-s]を温度[C]から求める
member.returns: 加熱蒸気の動粘性係数[kg/m-s]
member.remarks: 'Heat Transfer' by Alan J. Chapman, 1974. (Note: there is little variation in viscosity at higher pressures.)

member.name: M:Popolo.ThermophysicalProperty.Water.Steamk(System.Double)
member.summary: 加熱蒸気の熱伝導率[kW/m-C]を温度[C]から求める
member.remarks: 'Heat Transfer' by Alan J. Chapman, 1974.

member.name: M:Popolo.ThermophysicalProperty.Water.Wrho(System.Double)
member.summary: 1[atm]での水密度[kg/m3]を温度[C]から求める
member.remarks: CRC Handbook of Chem. and Phys., 61st Edition (1980-1981), p. F-6.

member.name: M:Popolo.ThermophysicalProperty.Water.Wmu(System.Double)
member.summary: 1[atm]での水の粘性[kg/m-s]を温度[C]から求める
member.remarks: Fit to data from Karlekar and Desmond

member.name: M:Popolo.ThermophysicalProperty.Water.Wk(System.Double)
member.summary: 1[atm]での蒸気の熱伝導率[kW/m-K]を温度[C]から求める

member.name: M:Popolo.ThermophysicalProperty.Water.Wcp(System.Double)
member.summary: 1[atm]での空気の比熱[kJ/kg-C]を温度[C]から求める
